Header: Enterprise Sri Lanka Exhibition will begin in Jaffna tomorrow
Content: The Enterprise Sri Lanka Exhibition will begin in Mutraveli in Jaffna tomorrow. The opening will take place under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. The Enterprise Sri Lanka Exhibition is being held under the Enterprise Sri Lanka programme mooted with the motive of grooming one hundred thousand entrepreneurs. The Exhibition will be held from tomorrow until the 10th of this month and will be open to the public from 9 am to 12 midnight. Individuals who intend to launch new business ventures in the industrial, agricultural, fisheries and tourism sectors can obtain interest relief loans. Its objective is to upgrade endemic industries in the Jaffna District. A special mobile service will be operative in this respect. Instructions and guidelines on obtaining loans from self-employment to small and medium scale industries will be given.
